fullText: The play works best when it focuses on the personal rivalry between the two athletes, exploring how their contrasting styles and backgrounds fueled their competitive fire.

bwwExcerpt: Lacking an actual basketball game on an actual basketball court, Eric Simonson's "Magic/Bird" has zip drama. But techno-savvy designers make terrific use of classic NBA footage, and the actors playing Magic and Bird are cute enough to carry it off. Basketball fans are the obvious target aud, but the...
